3: I found myself in a strange place after entering the game. I took a few steps around, and realized this must be the spawn point of this game.
I didn't see anyone around, but Kamui mentioned we would be playing in teams.
I anxiously opened the menu and selected the Member section.
Character: 【kuroname】. Team members: Vera, Camu, Karenina.
I was shocked when I saw their names.
Never thought I would be forming a team with them.
What's up? You got a problem?
It was Karenina.
I didn't see this coming...
Vera came from the right. She was dragging her blade on the ground, making a clinking sound.
You took so long.
Camu also jumped out from the left.
They walked to a position and stopped, then formed a regular triangle around me, still wearing their summer Coatings.
I looked at the system notifications. These outfits seemed to be the default 'hero's attire' generated by the system data.

2: Did you have to rehearse for this entrance?

3: What rehearsal? They were just copying me!
Still impressive though.
...Did you hit your head?
I actually liked that line. Too bad she didn't.
Enough stupid jokes. Now that the last member is here, let's hurry up and head to the castle.
True. Speaking of which, Karenina, you went for scouting, didn't you? Did you see any castle? We have to go there for the King, right?

4: Were you all here earlier than me?

3: That's our main quest objective. This must be another of those role-playing games, where we need to take a quest from the King and defeat the Demon King.
About ten minutes. Constructs seemed to load the game faster. Now Gray Raven will probably be ahead of us.
That's why we must hurry. I don't want to lose to that fool.
I went for scouting, but not for the castle.
What did you do then?
To find the other team and kill them, of course. If we spawned nearby, they shouldn't be too far away.
Wow... I didn't expect that. How did you go?
Nothing, duh. I came back empty-handed. Do I have to explain everything to you?
No. I just want to hear you admit your failure.
You red-haired ****...
Stop it! Enemies have heard us!
Urgh!
Screw the enemies. I have more important things to do now!
Oh can you?
Seeing there was nothing he could do to stop those two, Camu let out a roar, threw his greatsword away and charged toward the enemies, while Karenina was falling for Vera's taunt.
Beep! Beep! Beep!
It was a complete chaos.
Only one word could describe my feeling at the moment.
Hopeless.
